content.rendered:
I give permission to try
I give permission to cry
I give permission to ask why
I give permission to sigh

I give permission to love
I give permission to hug
I give permission to be
I give permission to me

I give permission to laugh
I give permission to smile
I give permission to hike
And to go a whole mile

I give permission to you
I give permission to me
To be what God
Crated us to be

I give permission to save
I give permission to spend
I give permission to receive
And permission to send

I give permission to make
I give permission to take
I give permission to create
And permission to break

But be careful what you break
Whether asleep or awake
Whether it be your art
Or someone’s heart
Do it in love
For God up above
Sees you
He sees what you do
And he loves
Others too

I give permission to try
To cry
To sigh
To love
To hug
To laugh and to smile
I give permission
For you
To be
You
